In a group that satisfies the normalizer condition, every maximal subgroup is normal

type: ∀ {G : Type u_1} [inst : Group G] (H : Subgroup G), NormalizerCondition G → IsCoatom H → H.Normal
name: Subgroup.NormalizerCondition.normal_of_coatom
docString: In a group that satisfies the normalizer condition, every maximal subgroup is normal

Any normal subgroup is either `⊥` or `⊤`

type: ∀ {G : Type u_1} {inst : Group G} [self : IsSimpleGroup G] (H : Subgroup G), H.Normal → H = ⊥ ∨ H = ⊤
name: IsSimpleGroup.eq_bot_or_eq_top_of_normal
docString: Any normal subgroup is either `⊥` or `⊤`

The normal closure of s is a normal subgroup.

type: ∀ {G : Type u_1} {s : Set G} [inst : Group G], IsNormalSubgroup (Group.normalClosure s)
name: Group.normalClosure.is_normal
docString: The normal closure of s is a normal subgroup.

A finite group of prime order is cyclic.

type: ∀ {α : Type u_1} [inst : AddGroup α] {p : ℕ} [hp : Fact (Nat.Prime p)], Nat.card α = p → IsAddCyclic α
name: isAddCyclic_of_prime_card
docString: A finite group of prime order is cyclic.

A finite group of prime order is cyclic.

type: ∀ {α : Type u_1} [inst : Group α] {p : ℕ} [hp : Fact (Nat.Prime p)], Nat.card α = p → IsCyclic α
name: isCyclic_of_prime_card
docString: A finite group of prime order is cyclic.

Every proper subgroup `H` of `G` is a proper normal subgroup of the normalizer of `H` in `G`.

name: NormalizerCondition
docString: Every proper subgroup `H` of `G` is a proper normal subgroup of the normalizer of `H` in `G`.

The normal closure of `s` is a normal subgroup.

type: ∀ {G : Type u_1} [inst : Group G] {s : Set G}, (Subgroup.normalClosure s).Normal
name: Subgroup.normalClosure_normal
docString: The normal closure of `s` is a normal subgroup.

A finite group is nilpotent iff the normalizer condition holds, and iff all maximal groups are
normal and iff all Sylow groups are normal and iff the group is the direct product of its Sylow
groups.

type:
∀ {G : Type u_1} [hG : Group G] [inst : Finite G],
  [Group.IsNilpotent G, NormalizerCondition G, ∀ (H : Subgroup G), IsCoatom H → H.Normal,
      ∀ (p : ℕ), Fact (Nat.Prime p) → ∀ (P : Sylow p G), (↑P).Normal,
      Nonempty (((p : { x // x ∈ (Nat.card G).primeFactors }) → (P : Sylow (↑p) G) → ↥↑P) ≃* G)].TFAE
name: isNilpotent_of_finite_tfae
docString:
A finite group is nilpotent iff the normalizer condition holds, and iff all maximal groups are
normal and iff all Sylow groups are normal and iff the group is the direct product of its Sylow
groups.

A group is commutative if the quotient by the center is cyclic.

type:
{G : Type u_2} →
  {G' : Type u_3} →
    [inst : Group G] →
      [inst_1 : Group G'] → [inst_2 : IsCyclic G'] → (f : G →* G') → f.ker ≤ Subgroup.center G → CommGroup G
name: commGroupOfCyclicCenterQuotient
docString: A group is commutative if the quotient by the center is cyclic.
